Detailed Description

Animation (Data) Module. Allows to creates and handle Animations data. It consists of a structure containing data for a single animation and functions for handling and accessing them. Animations are structures. They thus can be referenced by Animation Sets (orxAnimSet) Module.

Define Documentation

#define orxANIM_KU32_EVENT_MAX_NUMBER   15

Maximum number of events for an animation structure

#define orxANIM_KU32_FLAG_2D   0x00000001

2D type animation ID flag

#define orxANIM_KU32_FLAG_NONE   0x00000000

Anim flags No flags

#define orxANIM_KU32_KEY_MAX_NUMBER   255

Anim defines Maximum number of keys for an animation structure

#define orxANIM_KU32_MASK_USER_ALL   0x0000000F

User all ID mask

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum orxANIM_EVENT

Event enum

Enumerator:
orxANIM_EVENT_START  Event sent when an animation starts
orxANIM_EVENT_STOP  Event sent when an animation stops
orxANIM_EVENT_CUT  Event sent when an animation is cut
orxANIM_EVENT_LOOP  Event sent when an animation has looped
orxANIM_EVENT_CUSTOM_EVENT  Event sent when a custom event is reached
orxANIM_EVENT_NUMBER 
orxANIM_EVENT_NONE
